text: evadu sanmarganni avalambistado, atadu niscayanga, tana meluke sanmarganni avalambistadu. Mariyu evadu margabhrastudavutado, atadu niscayanga, tana nastanike margabhrastudavutadu. Mariyu baruvu mose vadevvadu marokani baruvunu moyadu. Mariyu memu oka pravaktanu pampa nanta varaku (prajalaku) siksa vidhincevaramu kamu
